casebody.data:
CHAPPELL
v.
NC DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION 51PA19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 30, 2019 James M. Stanley, Jr., Special Deputy Attorney General, for NC Department Of Transportation. Alexandra M. Hightower, Assistant Attorney General, for NC Department Of Transportation. William A. Smith, Assistant Attorney General, for NC Department Of Transportation. Jacob H. Wellman, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for NC Department Of Transportation. Matthew W. Skidmore, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for NC Department Of Transportation. Steven M. Sartorio, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for NC Department Of Transportation. William H. Moss, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for NC Department Of Transportation. Garris Neil Yarborough, Attorney at Law, Fayetteville, for Chappell, Ted P., et al. H. Addison Winters, Attorney at Law, Fayetteville, for Chappell, Ted P., et al. T. Paul Hendrick, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, for Chappell, Ted P., et al. Matthew H. Bryant, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, for Chappell, Ted P., et al.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 29th of July 2019 by Plaintiffs:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th of July 2019."

Plaintiffs shall have up to and including the 13th day of September 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
